availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Stringer married Sobina J. Dame on January 24, 1854. He was a farmer in McLean County.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, “Gray Rube Stringer (February 5, 1829-August 9, 1886),” Memorial #100864777, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=100864777 (June 4, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean, not stated, p. 117; Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records ñ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #000557316, Muhlenberg County Marriages, p. 100.
